localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
blogPost.body: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
blogPost.title: Yada - Never rewrite anything again
blogPost.author: Akshay Pall

localize.description: Yada是一个集头脑风暴、编辑和展示你的想法于一身的解决方案。从编写你的文档开始，选择如何呈现你的内容与视图。以任何顺序和任何时间对内容或视图进行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重写任何东西了

localize.description: Yada是一個集頭腦風暴、編輯和展示你的想法於一身的解決方案。從編寫你的文檔開始，選擇如何呈現你的內容與視圖。以任何順序和任何時間對內容或視圖進行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重寫任何東西了

previous.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeap’s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
previous.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.

localize.description: 用UserLeap的产品内微调查来收集和了解用户洞察力! 访问75个以上的免费微调查模板，每个模板都是由我们的用户研究团队设计的，并按照使用案例进行分类，这样你就可以快速得到你最重要的产品问题的答案。
localize.tagline: 通过75+免费的微调查模板获得持续的洞察力。

localize.description: 用UserLeap的產品內微調查來收集和了解用戶洞察力! 訪問75個以上的免費微調查模板，每個模板都是由我們的用戶研究團隊設計的，並按照使用案例進行分類，這樣你就可以快速得到你最重要的產品問題的答案。
localize.tagline: 通過75+免費的微調查模板獲得持續的洞察力。

next.excerpt: Habio allows you to dive into the very nature of your habits through psychological exercises, CBT-based reflection journal and timely reminders adjusting to lifestyle goals. Habio is a perfect tool to help you improve your daily routines step by step.
next.title: Habio - Your habit assistant to build new habits & change life

localize.description: Habio让你通过心理练习、基于CBT的反思日记和及时提醒调整生活方式目标，深入了解自己习惯的本质。Habio是一个完美的工具，可以帮助你一步步改善你的日常习惯。
localize.tagline: 你的习惯助手，建立新的习惯，改变生活。

localize.description: Habio讓你通過心理練習、基於CBT的反思日記和及時提醒調整生活方式目標，深入瞭解自己習慣的本質。Habio是一個完美的工具，可以幫助你一步步改善你的日常習慣。
localize.tagline: 你的習慣助手，建立新的習慣，改變生活。
